name: Blob Wars (TheJackOfClubs)
description:
Build a deck of blobby characters to take on a series of battles. Compete with others for who can compete the game on the highest difficulty with the built-in online leaderboard!

Many things in the game have tooltips - hover your mouse over them for a short description of what they do.

Tip: Use the tokens! Without using tokens, even a much weaker enemy can run you over if the timing works in their favour. With good token use, you can outwit enemies much stronger than yourself

Controls

Entirely mouse-based

Credits

All code, art, and sounds created by me during the jam period.

Leaderboard backend provided by LootLocker

Created using Godot, Aseprite, Krita, and Audacity
